ygData.subject: Re: Lost Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: I usually play a tank when I group (though I have been on the other end - I also have a shaman I use sometimes) and the number one rule is : * KEEP THE
ygData.messageBody:
I usually play a tank when I group (though I have
been on the other end - I also have a shaman I use
sometimes) and the number one rule is :<br><br>* KEEP THE
HEALER ALIVE AT ALL COSTS!! *<br><br>If you can keep the
healer alive, you can live to fight another fight.
Anyone that plays a tank should know that. If it means
taking a few hits from behind while trying to taunt the
creature attacking the healer, so be it. As a tank, your
number one priority is to protect your team... no matter
what the cost... Even if it means staying and taking
the creature toe to toe, while they run... This is
the life of a tank...<br><br>Just my 2 cents...
